message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I can do $110, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Let me see if I can meet you in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $105?
I can do $105, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Let me see if I can get closer to your budget.
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $102?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can meet you at $108, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $100?
I've already offered $108 and you've countered at $100. I'm not willing to go lower than that. I think we're at a stalemate. I'm going to sell the product to John for $80.
